net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_Macro_rollAction
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Rolls the action with the given name. Supports advantage and disadvantage.

arg(0) = Object describing what needs to be rolled
  {
    "actionName": The name of the action to be rolled
    "advantageDisadvantage": Should none, advantage, disadvantage or both be applied
  }

Outputs the results to chat and saves them for later application to targets
